# Problem 12.39 - 3D Mohr's Circle {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A plane stress state results in principal stress σ<sub>1</sub> = 435 MPa and σ<sub>2</sub> = -124 MPa. Use Mohr's Circle to determine the maximum in-plane and maximum absolute shear stresses.
